short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Shopee Product Images. The most popular assistant tool for Shopee!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save Shopee product images in one click!
This extension allows you to easily save Shopee images to your computer.

----- GETTING STARTED -----
1. Install the extension by clicking the "Add to chrome" button.
2. Open an Shopee product page.
3. Click on the download buttons next to the product images.

----- FEATURES -----
- Download images one by one.
- Download main product images and variation product images.
- Get the best quality image download.

If you have any questions, or suggestions to improve the app, please let us know at chenjsh36@gmail.com!
